text: aur bahut-se jinn aur maanav ko hamane narak ke lie paida kiya hai. unake paas dil hain, jinase soch-vichaar nahin karate, unakee aankhen hain, jinase[1] nahin dekhate aur kaan hain, jinase nahin sunate. ve pashuon ke samaan hain; balki unase bhee adhik kupath hain, yahee log achetana mein pade hue hain
